Module.Content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
		<html>
			<head>
				<title>Search Visualization</title>
				<style type="text/css">
					html, body, iframe {
						width: 100%;
						height: 100%;
						margin: 0;
						padding: 0;
					}
					body {
					 	background: #000;
					}
                    iframe {
                        border: none;
                    }
				</style>
				<script type="text/javascript">
				    var iframe = undefined;
				
					function receiveVisualizationRequest(topic, data, subscriberData) {
						var contentWindow = iframe[0].contentWindow;
                
		                contentWindow.postMessage(data, '*');
					}
					
					gadgets.HubSettings.onConnect = function(hub, suc, err) {
						gadgets.Hub.subscribe('gfbio.search.selectedData', receiveVisualizationRequest);
					};

                    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
                        iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
                        iframe.id = 'searchVisualizationFrame';
                        iframe.src = 'http://pc12388.mathematik.uni-marburg.de:8080/gfbio_search_visualization.html';
                        document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(iframe);
                    });
				</script>
			</head>
			<body></body>
		</html>
